::Skulletron::

	Skulletron stood still as Zardus asked him if he could make him laugh. 
Skulletron didn't know about this, Zardus didn't look like much of a
laughing person.  Skulletron would have to use a strong dose of laughing
power for Zardus.  Skulletron went beast mode, as he could only use this
ability in beast mode.  When Skulletron used his ability on the holographic
bot, he only put a small effort into it, because the hologram seemed weak
enough.  To actually use the ability good, Skulletron has to connect his
mind with the target's own mind so Skulletron's mind could send images to
the target's mind.  Skulletron tried as hard as he could to connect with
Zardus's strong mind.  Zardus had a strong mind.  A very strong mind.  Once
it seemed he was connected with Zardus's mind, Skulletron cleared his own
mind.  Skulletron's mind then showed an image of what appeared to be
Dinobot, Blackarachnia, Optimus Prime and Megatron dressed up as clowns. 
Dinobot was bopping his nose, making honking noises.  Optimus was moving
his hand up and down his face and each time it went up or down he had a
different expression on him.  Megatron was riding a unicycle and honking a
horn he was holding.  Blackarachnia was doing funny dances all over the
place.  Then, the image was replaced by a new one.  The new image had the
same four bots in it, except this time they were riding horses, side by
side.  Then the horses started riding towards a long tree branch, as he as
their heads.  The horses went faster, and then all four of them were hit by
the branch and fell off.  Skulletron, his mind still connected with
Zardus's mind, hoped that Zardus would let out at least a giggle.
